short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reporting spam/scam/suspicious posts containing a phone number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you come across a post on Facebook, Twitter, or Youtube containing a phone number and you think it is spreading a scam or looks suspicious, please report us using the PhoneRep plugin. This will help us in removing such phone numbers from online social networks.
